title: The Earnings Picture Continues to Improve
text: Given the emerging consensus on the 'soft-landing' outlook, one can expect this favorable turn in the overall earnings picture to strengthen further as companies report Q3 results and share trends in underlying business.

title: META Up +4% on +23% Revenue Growth; IBM and NOW Also Beat
text: The social media leader posted a big beat on earnings -- $4.39 per share versus expectations of $3.62 and the year-ago number of $1.64 per share.

title: Amazon launches new AI product image generator
text: The functionality works similar to other open-ended text-to-image generators such as OpenAI's DALL-E 3 and Midjourney.

title: 3 Growth Stocks That Will Make You Rich in 20 Years
text: The current market volatility, while disconcerting, is opening up opportunities to buy strong growth stocks on the cheap. As share prices drop, some stocks that are usually expensive stocks become much cheaper.

title: Google's Cloud Disappointed, Microsoft's Impressed. What's In Store For Amazon?
text: Microsoft stock gained on a cloud revenue boost, Google's fell after a cloud miss. What are the expectations for AMZN stock?

title: Amazon's stock sinks toward worst day in more than 8 months amid AWS fears
text: Amazon.com Inc.'s stock AMZN, -5.60% is on track Wednesday for its largest one-day drop in more than eight months, as Alphabet Inc.'s GOOG, -9.76% GOOGL, -9.63% cloud-computing slowdown appears to be spooking investors. Amazon's stock is off 5.7% in afternoon trading and on pace to log its biggest one-day percentage decline since Feb. 3, when it fell 8.4%, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

title: Amazon (AMZN) Upgraded to Buy: Here's What You Should Know
text: Amazon (AMZN) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

title: Amazon Launches AI-Powered Image Generation Tool for Advertisers
text: Amazon Ads introduced a new generative artificial intelligence (AI) solution for image generation, aimed at helping advertisers enhance their ad campaigns and create more engaging content. Now in beta, this image generation tool enables brands to produce lifestyle imagery that improves the performance of their ads, Amazon said in a Wednesday (Oct. 25) press release.

title: Why Amazon Stock Was Down After Alphabet's News Today
text: Alphabet's Google Cloud posted lower growth than expected. Google Cloud's weak report might foretell a sluggish quarter for Amazon's cloud business.

title: Amazon's focus on speed, surveillance drives higher warehouse worker injuries, study finds
text: Amazon warehouse workers are suffering physical injuries and mental stress on the job due to Amazon's focus on speed and pervasive surveillance, per a study.

title: Should You Buy Amazon ETFs Ahead of Q3 Earnings?
text: Amazon has lost 0.5% over the past three months and underperformed the industry, with an average decline of 7%. The underperformance might reverse if the online behemoth comes up with an earnings beat.

title: Amazon delivery drones: How the sky could be the limit for market dominance
text: Amazon's latest plan to use drones to deliver packages in the UK by the end of 2024 is essentially a relaunch. It was ten years ago that the company's founder Jeff Bezos first announced it would fly individual packages through the sky.

title: 'Christmas comes early with Prime Big Deals Days': Here's what Wall Street expects from Amazon's 3rd-quarter earnings report

title: Does Amazon (AMZN) Have the Potential to Rally 31.85% as Wall Street Analysts Expect?
text: The mean of analysts' price targets for Amazon (AMZN) points to a 31.9% upside in the stock. While this highly sought-after metric has not proven reasonably effective, strong agreement among analysts in raising earnings estimates does indicate an upside in the stock.

title: Earnings Previews: Reports Coming Thursday Afternoon from Amazon, Ford, Intel, US Steel

title: Is a Second Amazon Prime Day Shaping Up to Be an Annual Occurrence?
text: Amazon had its best-ever fall sales event with its Big Deal Days earlier this month. The vast majority of people who shopped at this event also shopped on Prime Day in July.

title: Amazon launches European 'sovereign' cloud as EU data debate rages
text: Amazon Web Services European Sovereign Cloud will be located within Europe and will be separate to the U.S. technology giant's other cloud operations.
